title: Be My Rebel
lyrics:
Day dream wash away, come on back another day
Been the host of this fine wine company
I'm wild in the wind and it's not quite time to come back
Rev rev roll away, light it up and rip away
The roller coaster of my little mystery

I'm wild in the wind and it's not quite time to come back



I'm twisting and turning and ripping and reeling and burning and steaming and scratching my way out...

Never stop spinning the vision and sound

Ashes to ashes we all bow down



Be my rebel, be my rebel, be my rebel in me

Be my rebel, be my rebel, be my rebel in me



Ch... Change out the burning man

but that last ride home you can never plan

Raise a glass to the Blackstar before he comes back



I'm twisting and turning and ripping and reeling and burning and steaming and scratching my way out...

Never stop spinning that vision and sound

Ashes to ashes we all bow down



Be my rebel, be my rebel, be my rebel in me

Be my rebel, be my rebel, be my rebel in me
